mapper.select: select sum(outcome) outcome, sum(ticketincome) ticketincome, sum(storeincome) storeincome, to_char(revenuedate,'yyyy-mm') revenuedate from revenue r,branch b where r.branchnum=b.branchnum and b.brname=#{brName} and to_char(revenuedate,'yyyy-mm') between #{date} and #{date1} group by to_char(revenuedate,'yyyy-mm') ORDER BY revenuedate
